description:
A collection of utilities bringing back classic features to Windows.


What's Changed
- Avoid recursive Start menu initialization (#1675) by @ge0rdi in https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/pull/1678
- Fix potential division by zero in DetectGrayscaleImage (#1696) by @ge0rdi in https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/pull/1701
- Update Start Menu style previews. by @Lixkote in https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/pull/1836
- Make FixFolderScroll available in all Windows versions by @ge0rdi in https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/pull/1887
- Fix start button/menu misalignment on touch-screen devices by @ge0rdi in https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/pull/1850
- ModernSettings: Use proper AllSystemSettings file on newer Win11 by @ge0rdi in https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/pull/2035
New Contributors
- @Lixkote made their first contribution in https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/pull/1836
- @darthmooguy made their first contribution in https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/pull/1912
- @Need74 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/pull/1793
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/compare/v4.4.191...v4.4.194
